thread.title: Sculpture suitable for framing at Hunters Point
thread.title_full: Sculpture suitable for framing at Hunters Point - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Sam Whiting
title: Sculpture suitable for framing at Hunters Point
text:
Photo: Liz Hafalia, The Chronicle Bayview Horn by Jerry Ross Barrish is a fifteen-foot-tall figure of a lone musician playing a horn next to The Store House at the shipyard in San Francisco, Calif., on Friday, October 2, 2015. Bayview Horn by Jerry Ross Barrish is a fifteen-foot-tall figure...
The view of the Bay Bridge from Hunters Point is suitable for framing so that’s what Mildred Howard did — put an ornate walk-thru picture frame around the view. Bayview Horn by Jerry Ross Barrish is a fifteen-foot-tall figure of a lone musician playing a horn next to The Store House at the shipyard in San Francisco, Calif., on Friday, October 2, 2015. Bayview Horn by Jerry Ross Barrish is a fifteen-foot-tall figure...
The view of the Bay Bridge from Hunters Point is suitable for framing so that’s what Mildred Howard did — put an ornate walk-thru picture frame around the view.
